Goblin.Name: Goblin
Goblin.Description: Goblins wield a crude spear and attack from melee range. Individually, they are relatively weak but can pose a threat in large numbers.
Goblin.Flavortext: Aberrations that have manifested from dark mana, summoned by an event known as the Awakening. These orc-like creatures have constructed rudimentary tools, clothing, and a tribal system. These particular ones seem to fulfill the role of protectors in their tribes.

Goblin Bowyer.Name: Goblin Bowyer
Goblin Bowyer.Description: Goblins with a bow and arrow to shoot enemies from afar. They are effective at range, but they lack fighting power and defense up close.
Goblin Bowyer.Flavortext: Goblins who have been exposed to larger amounts of dark mana during the Awakening gain a slight, but not insignificant, increase in their intelligence levels and are able to perform more complex tasks such as crafting bows and hunting food for their tribe.
